name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.71 - AI Studio & UX Upgrades
lastChange: Upgraded AI Studio with auto-scroll, default unchecked items, and emoji generation. Fixed chat auto-scrolling. Reworked dashboard view switcher. Added 30+ new trophies. Fixed 'Copy Prompt' button.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
